definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty signed by every single nation.
sentences.chinese: 讓每一個國家都簽署《核不擴散條約》。

sentences.english: Now we are having the N.P.T. video conference in New York.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們在紐約開核不擴散條約視頻會議。

sentences.english: Both countries are signatories to the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.
sentences.chinese: 兩個國家都是《核不擴散條約》的簽約國。

sentences.english: Nuclear disarmament and nuclear non-proliferation is a major of the meeting agenda.
sentences.chinese: 核裁軍和核不擴散是本次會議的一大議題。

sentences.english: The President's commitment to Non-Proliferation results.
sentences.chinese: 總統承諾繼續加強核不擴散。

sentences.english: China will continue to play a constructive role in upholding the international nuclear non-proliferation regime.
sentences.chinese: 中國願繼續爲維護國際核不擴散體系發揮建設性作用。

sentences.english: Nuclear disarmament and nonproliferation are mutually dependent.
sentences.chinese: 核裁軍與核不擴散相輔相成。
